summary: Rumor: Avengers: Endgame Could Have an Intermission
title: Rumor: Avengers: Endgame Could Have an Intermission
body:
Rumor: Avengers: Endgame Could Have an Intermission

A new rumor from Alan Cerny of ComingSoon reveals that Marvel Studios is pondering the possibility of including an intermission due to the alleged lengthy run time of the film.

Rumor has it Marvel is considering an intermission for AVENGERS: ENDGAME as it is currently clocking at three hours.

Bring it on. I love intermissions. Makes the movies that have them feel very epic. Besides, a pee break…

View On WordPress

summary: The Russos Say Avengers: Endgame is Still at the Three-Hour Mark
title: The Russos Say Avengers: Endgame is Still at the Three-Hour Mark
body:
Make it 4-5 hours!! The more the better!!

While we all liked to say AVENGERS: INFINITY WAR was the culmination of 10 years of filmmaking, the reality is AVENGERS: ENDGAME is truly the big finale. There’s a ton that has to be wrapped up and answered for in this one, especially that intense conclusion of INFINITY WAR, so it’s completely understandable if the story needs a long runtime to bring everything to a satisfying end. Turns out that…

summary: AVENGERS: ENDGAME is currently THREE-HOURS LONG. This ain’t enough. GIVE ME SIX. You nerds can love your bloated Return of the...
caption:
AVENGERS: ENDGAME is currently THREE-HOURS LONG. This ain’t enough. GIVE ME SIX.

You nerds can love your bloated Return of the King. Me? I’m ready to love an insanely long coda to the first ten years of Marvel Studios movies. Three fucking hours? Give me six.

Keep Reading »

summary: Star Trek's Influence on the MCU Could Give Hints to the 'Endgame'
title: Star Trek's Influence on the MCU Could Give Hints to the 'Endgame'
body:
Long before the Marvel Cinematic Universe made the concept of a shared universe the popular thing to copy in Hollywood, Star Trek was doing it. The syndicated television shows in the 90s, The Next Generation, Deep Space Nine, Voyager and then Enterprise, all existed in the same universe established by the 1960’s Original Series. They had a shared canon, and it wasn’t unusual for characters from…

summary: hey, is the saved series finished?
question: hey, is the saved series finished?
answer: Yep. It is finished for now. I would not rule out a sequel if Endgame inspires me. If I have to write broody Steve Rogers another happy ending, I will. Lol.

summary: Avengers: Endgame, i test screening rivelano una durata di 3 ore?
title: Avengers: Endgame, i test screening rivelano una durata di 3 ore?
body:
Avengers: Endgame, i test screening rivelano una durata di 3 ore?

Le reazioni dei primi test di screening di Avengers: Endgame con un autonomia di 3 ore (che a quanto pare sembra esser vero), sono state fantastiche, secondo i registi Anthony e Joe Russo.

I Marvel Studios continuano a costruire hype per il loro 22° capitolo dell’Universo Cinematografico Marvel, ed il quarto film degli Avengers sarà il primo a mostrare le conseguenze dello schiocco mortale di…

blog.name: mrdaps
blog.title: Mr. DAPs
blog.description:
Hi there!

I am Mr. DAPs, that guy with the hat that walks around Disneyland. I will mainly be posting some pictures that I have taken that I particularly like here but will occasionally post some other things.

You can read some of my other posts at any or all of the links below:

Blog: mrdaps.com
Website: dapsmagic.com
Twitter: twitter.com/mrdaps
Facebook: facebook.com/misterdaps

Please feel free to add me on any or all of the above links. I look forward to chatting with you and seeing you in the park!

Make it a GREAT day!

-Mr. DAPs

title: Super Trailers - GEEKS CORNER - Episode 919 (#437)
body:
Super Trailers – GEEKS CORNER – Episode 919 (#437)

Welcome to this week’s episode of GEEKS CORNER! This week, things kick off with talk about the Super Bowl. Well, the trailers that appeared during the Super Bowl! This year there were trailers released for Avengers: Endgame, Captain Marvel, and Toy Story 4. After a lengthy conversation about these, that include reference to The Lord of The Rings, the conversations pivot to Star Wars. Anthony…

blog.name: originaljediinjeans
blog.title: One Wandering Jedi
blog.description:
Yes, it hurt when I fell from heaven, meaning when Order 66 happened and I had to leave my home galaxy.
IRL: I am a member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day saints. I'm a cosplayer, a fangirl, an artist, and a dreamer. Top fandoms: Star Wars, Harry Potter, MCU/Avengers, Lord of the Rings. My favorite Disney princess is Mira Nova. I'm also madly in love with Bucky Barnes. In case you haven't figured it out by now, I'm autistic.

summary: If Chewie/Goose was in Avengers: Endgame, it would be way too easy to score a victory for the Avengers. Once they got half the...
body:
If Chewie/Goose was in Avengers: Endgame, it would be way too easy to score a victory for the Avengers. Once they got half the universe back, all the flerken would need to do is eat the Infinity Stones and keep them in the interdimensional pockets in its tongue–that’s what they are, right?

but on second thought, if any other bad guys wanted the Infinity Stones, all they’d have to do is kill the cat. so maybe it’s not that cut and dry.

but on second thought, if any other bad guys wanted the Infinity Stones, all they’d have to do is kill the cat. so maybe it’s not that cut and dry.

summary: ‘Some people move on, but not us’  What if those snapped are the ones still alive and the ones left (ie: the original six) are...
body:
‘Some people move on, but not us’

What if those snapped are the ones still alive and the ones left (ie: the original six) are the ones trapped and thus, can’t ‘move on’?

That’s how I’d write it. Just sayin.

reblog.comment:
‘Some people move on, but not us’

What if those snapped are the ones still alive and the ones left (ie: the original six) are the ones trapped and thus, can’t ‘move on’?

That’s how I’d write it. Just sayin.
